subproject.corporate outcome: Local and national authorities have the capacities to access and integrate multiple sources of public and private environmental financing in support of sustainable human development, including gender equality and poverty reduction
subproject.description: The project is to extend institutional strengthening support to the National Ozone Office at the Department of Environment and the Government of Iran. This extension will continue the ongoing efforts of Government of Iran in coordinating all activities required to effectively and efficiently phase out Ozone Depleting Substances through the adoption of policy, technological and monitoring procedures covering the projects and programmes specified in the Country Programme. The IS projects assist the Department of Environment to ensure Iran's compliance with the provisions of the Montreal Protocol.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Institutional StrengtheningVII
